message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs. It comes with a wide range of features and benefits that we believe would greatly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $150 for it. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the features and benefits you mentioned. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your offer. However, given the high-quality materials and advanced technology used in this product, I believe a fair price would be $100. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.
